columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: UNOS_LUNG_SURG_TS_C_NAME
columns.description: A list of the types of non-transplant lung surgery the patient has undergone prior to UNOS registration
